username.description: Please ensure that the user has the adequate permissions. For more information, please read the official documentation U(https://goo.gl/ddJa4Q).

time_interval_days.description: T i m e   i n t e r v a l   i n   d a y s .

time_interval_minutes.description: T i m e   i n t e r v a l   i n   m i n u t e s .

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the SolidFire cluster.

state.description: Whether the specified schedule should exist or not.

time_interval_hours.description: T i m e   i n t e r v a l   i n   h o u r s .

schedule_id.description: The schedule ID for the schedule that you want to update or delete.

volumes.description: Volume IDs that you want to set the snapshot schedule for. At least 1 volume ID is required for creating a new schedule. required when C(state=present)

starting_date.description: Starting date for the schedule. Required when C(state=present). Please use two '-' in the above format, or you may see an error- TypeError, is not JSON serializable description. Format: C(2016--12--01T00:00:00Z)

retention.description: Retention period for the snapshot. Format is 'HH:mm:ss'.
